Ann Marlax

  1. Alternate Birth Name: Anne; Annie; Muliek
  2. Foster Name:
  3. Foster Family: Peter Schmitz
  4. Foster Family Alt: Schmidt
  5. Location of Family: Omaha, NE
  6. Sending Organization: Foundling Hospital

  8. Age on Arrival: 3
  9. Date of Birth: 1913-10-07, New York City, NY
  10. Gender: female
  11. Married Name: Ann (Parker) M. Christensen
  12. Spouse Name: Rufus Christensen
